preReview.title: Potter understands fan frustration after poor recent West Ham form
preReview.description: West Ham travel to Brighton in the Premier League on Saturday off the back of a 1-1 draw with relegated Southampton at home last week.

QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and West Ham United on Sat, 26 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 3–2 over West Ham United on Sat, 26 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Danny Welbeck has the least touches (29) of any outfield player.

Lucas Paquetá won the most duels (9) in the match.
